name: asserter
description: A tiny assertion lib for both nodejs and the browser.

scripts.lint: eslint asserter.js || echo [sudo] npm i -g eslint
scripts.dist: uglifyjs asserter.js > asserter.min.js || echo [sudo] npm i -g uglifyjs
scripts.docs: jsdoc asserter.js -d docs || echo [sudo] npm i -g jsdoc
scripts.cover: istanbul cover jasmine test/spec.js || echo [sudo] npm i -g istanbul jasmine

author: Luis Leiva
